Test Modules

Tests for analysis-page answer label and percentage formatting behavior.

test_analysis_format.app()[source]

Create a Flask app configured for test execution.

test_analysis_format.client(app)[source]

Create a test client for HTTP route checks.

test_analysis_format.test_all_analysis_items_are_labeled_with_answer_prefix(client)[source]

Verify each rendered analysis row starts with the Answer: prefix.

test_analysis_format.test_rendered_percentages_have_two_decimal_digits(client)[source]

Verify rendered percentage metrics include exactly two decimal digits.

Integration tests for Flask app orchestration and startup behavior.

test_app.test_pull_data_busy_states()[source]

Validate pull-worker busy detection for none, running, and done states.

test_app.test_start_pull_worker_sets_process(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure starting the worker stores the launched process handle.

test_app.test_run_pull_job_calls_dependencies(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure pull-job workflow calls scrape, save, and load in sequence.

test_app.test_perform_update_analysis_clears_cache()[source]

Ensure analysis cache reset empties stored results.

test_app.test_get_db_connection_uses_database_url(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure DATABASE_URL is used when positional connect arg is supported.

test_app.test_get_db_connection_uses_database_url_conninfo(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure DATABASE_URL is passed as conninfo when required.

test_app.test_get_db_connection_uses_default(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure default local database settings are used without DATABASE_URL.

test_app.test_index_uses_cached_results_when_skip_queries(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure index view returns cached results when query execution is skipped.

test_app.test_index_queries_and_formats_results(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure index view executes queries and formats row variants correctly.

test_app.test_pull_data_route_busy_and_ok(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure pull-data route returns expected statuses for busy and idle states.

test_app.test_update_analysis_route_busy_and_ok(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure update-analysis route returns expected statuses for busy and idle states.

test_app.test_create_app_registers_routes()[source]

Ensure app factory registers all required routes.

test_app.test_main_run_pull_job_branch(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure app main module executes pull-job branch and exits cleanly.

test_app.test_main_default_branch_runs_load_and_server(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure default main branch loads seed data and starts Flask server.

Route-level tests for analysis page action buttons and busy gating.

test_buttons.app()[source]

Create a test-configured Flask app with worker state reset.

test_buttons.client(app)[source]

Create a test client for button endpoint requests.

test_buttons.test_post_pull_data_returns_200(client, monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure POST /pull-data succeeds when no worker is active.

test_buttons.test_post_pull_data_triggers_loader(client, monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure pull-data flow passes scraped rows through save and load stages.

test_buttons.test_post_pull_data_returns_409_when_busy_and_skips_update_when_busy(client, monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure POST /pull-data returns 409 and does not launch when busy.

test_buttons.test_post_update_analysis_returns_200_when_not_busy(client)[source]

Ensure POST /update-analysis succeeds when not busy.

test_buttons.test_post_update_analysis_returns_409_and_skips_update_when_busy(client, monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure POST /update-analysis returns 409 and skips cache update when busy.

Integration tests for HTML cleaning and field extraction logic.

test_clean.test_clean_data_parses_rows_and_details()[source]

Ensure row parsing captures overview fields and detail-row enrichments.

test_clean.test_clean_data_returns_empty_list_when_no_rows()[source]

Ensure no table rows produces an empty record list.

Database-flow tests for pull-data insertion and deduplication semantics.

test_db_insert.app()[source]

Create a test Flask app with pull-worker state reset.

test_db_insert.client(app)[source]

Create a test client for database-flow endpoint testing.

test_db_insert.test_pull_data_inserts_new_rows_with_required_fields(client, monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure pull-data inserts rows with required non-empty schema fields.

test_db_insert.test_pull_data_is_idempotent_for_duplicate_rows_by_url(client, monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure repeated pull-data calls do not insert duplicate URLs.

test_db_insert.test_simple_query_returns_dict_with_expected_schema_keys(client, monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure a fetched row dictionary contains the expected schema key set.

Web-layer tests for Flask app routing and analysis page rendering.

test_flask_page.app()[source]

Create a Flask app configured for page-level web tests.

test_flask_page.client(app)[source]

Create a test client for HTTP requests to page routes.

test_flask_page.test_app_is_flask_instance_and_testable(app)[source]

Ensure app factory returns a Flask instance in testing mode.

test_flask_page.test_app_routes_are_created(app)[source]

Ensure expected routes exist with correct HTTP methods.

test_flask_page.test_get_analysis_returns_200(client)[source]

Ensure GET /analysis responds with HTTP 200.

test_flask_page.test_get_analysis_contains_page_buttons(client)[source]

Ensure analysis page renders pull/update action button elements.

test_flask_page.test_get_analysis_contains_page_content(client)[source]

Ensure analysis page includes core heading and answer text markers.

End-to-end integration tests spanning pull, update, and analysis render flow.

test_integration_end_to_end.app()[source]

Create an app instance with reset globals for integration scenarios.

test_integration_end_to_end.client(app)[source]

Create a test client for end-to-end request sequences.

test_integration_end_to_end.test_end_to_end_pull_update_render_flow(client, monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure pull, update, and analysis render produce expected formatted output.

test_integration_end_to_end.test_multiple_pull_data_requests_dedupe_by_url(client, monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure repeated pulls enforce URL-based deduplication across batches.

Integration tests for JSON loading and value normalization helpers.

test_load_data.test_clean_text_and_parse_number()[source]

Ensure helper normalizers clean null bytes and parse numeric tokens.

test_load_data.test_load_reads_json_array_and_resets_table(monkeypatch, capsys)[source]

Ensure array JSON input loads rows and reset mode recreates state.

test_load_data.test_load_reads_json_lines_and_skips_blank_lines(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure line-delimited JSON input is parsed and blank lines are ignored.

test_load_data.test_load_handles_empty_file(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure empty input files result in zero inserted rows.

Integration tests for query definition structure and CLI output formatting.

test_query_data.test_queries_list_contains_expected_items()[source]

Ensure the QUERIES container exposes valid label/prefix/SQL tuples.

test_query_data.test_main_executes_queries_and_formats_output(monkeypatch, capsys)[source]

Ensure standalone query runner prints expected formatted output values.

Integration tests for scraping URL normalization, filtering, and persistence.

test_scrape.test_normalise_url_handles_empty_and_trailing_slash()[source]

Ensure URL normalization handles empty input and strips trailing slashes.

test_scrape.test_get_existing_urls_normalises_and_filters(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure existing URL retrieval filters null/empty values and normalizes output.

test_scrape.test_scrape_data_filters_seen_urls_and_decodes(monkeypatch)[source]

Ensure scraping skips seen URLs and handles decode fallback behavior.

test_scrape.test_save_data_writes_json_and_prints(monkeypatch, capsys)[source]

Ensure saving rows writes JSON and reports saved row count.

test_scrape.test_save_data_handles_empty_rows(monkeypatch, capsys)[source]

Ensure saving empty rows reports zero saved records.
